name: one-price
description: Mini CRM Telegram WebApp for one client

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run bot:build
scripts.start:web:prod: sh -c 'echo PORT=$PORT && echo "[DB] migrate deploy" && npx prisma migrate deploy && echo "[WEB] next start" && next start -p ${PORT:-3000} -H 0.0.0.0'
scripts.bot:dev: unset TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN ADMIN_TELEGRAM_ID WEBAPP_URL && node --env-file=.env --watch --import tsx bot/index.ts
scripts.bot:start:local: unset TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN ADMIN_TELEGRAM_ID WEBAPP_URL && node --env-file=.env --import tsx bot/index.ts
